title: Participants
snippet: Engaging all stakeholders in urban development
description: Participants in urban planning include all stakeholders, from residents to policy-makers. Collaboration among participants ensures that projects reflect the needs of the entire community.
literature: The Participatory City by Hamdi and Goethert
Community Participation Methods in Design and Planning by Henry Sanoff
The City Reader by Richard T. LeGates and Frederic Stout
